description: Instance Metrics Dashboard of ECS EC2
title: Instance Metrics - ECS

AutoScalingGroupName.name: AutoScalingGroupName
AutoScalingGroupName.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'AutoScalingGroupName'))
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE JSONExtractString(labels, 'ClusterName') = {{ .ClusterName }} AND unix_milli >= toUnixTimestamp(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) * 1000

ClusterName.name: ClusterName
ClusterName.queryValue:
SELECT DISTINCT(JSONExtractString(labels, 'ClusterName'))
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day WHERE unix_milli >= toUnixTimestamp(now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY) * 1000

InstanceId.name: InstanceId
